titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: RELIGIOUS OR OTHER BELIEF SYSTEM AFFILIATION CODE - Description

body.p: RELIGIOUS OR OTHER BELIEF SYSTEM AFFILIATION CODE Â is the same as attribute RELIGIOUS OR OTHER BELIEF SYSTEM AFFILIATION CODE .
This item is not referenced in a data set in the NHS Data Model and Dictionary. It has been retained for information.
For specific National Code usage, see RELIGIOUS OR OTHER BELIEF SYSTEM AFFILIATION CODE .
